评论详情: Cards are safe from someone scanning your purse room for cards and light weight

I just received this little wallet, it was overnight delivery which was great.  I ordered in the Saffiano Sky Blue color and it came just as pictured.  I am a bit on the fence with the wallet because I am not sure that the cash holder will hold up over time because it is plastic, and I am also a little skeptical about the mechanism that releases the cards.  Brand new it is working well, but I am going to give it a couple of weeks or so to see how well it holds up.  One other thing, 6 cards in the pop up is very tight so I chose to only put 3 cards in it and I have on the inside slots my health care card, insurance card and DL, plus 7 bills, which is all I need on a daily basis.  With this amount it closes fairly easily but I don’t think it would hold much more on the inside without bulging or being harder to snap it closed.  I will update my review if any issues arise.
This is the best wallet for credit cards.  It keeps your cards safe and away from those credit card readers that bad people have to get your information.  It does not take up much room in a purse.

类型: Color: ID Window - Black Genuine Leather
评论详情: Got it for a man for Christmas & it was a hit! Small compact but holds a lot, the rfid blocker is perfect too holds bills and the triggered credit card slot holder is magnetic so it can attach to the phone if you want without the leather case. Up to 8 cards fit in the card holder perfectly, with a nice snap to let you know they’re secure but the best part is when you pull down the trigger the cards slide up so smoothly in a layered row so you can easily slip out any one at any time! Genius lil design feature then you push them back down and they pop back in with a resounding magnetic click! I got the leather one with the ID window too and it’s just such a clean cute in a masculine way wallet! Not to mention it’s super compact too. Fits in the middle of a palm and it’s not bulk AT ALL bc of the slim credit card holder box. It also has a button and snaps shut keeping everything tight and secure! A perfect gift for someone who is tough to get gifts for or has everything already or someone stylish! Father’s Day, Christmas, Birthday, Valentine’s Day, Graduation, Secret Santa etc. literally anyone for any occasion I think they would love this gift! It’s a fun functional classic Timeless type of gift 🎁

I previously had a wallet like this with just credit cards slots. I love the pop-up feature, but this one has a place to carry cash which makes it even better! The blue color is pretty and it's still very small which makes it so convenient for traveling, but great for every day use too!

This has really literally lightened my load. I got rid of my big bulky wallet, for this compact one. The directions weren't the greatest, but basically, you put in your ID, and cards, and push them down. Once inside, when you need them, push the button and they pop up. Simple, easy, and saves a ton of space. Not to mention, I love, love, love, the color. It matches my phone case perfectly.

My husband and I both got these wallets(in different colors and materials) to keep our cards from being scanned. I did not expect all the compliments that people give us on how cool they look. I agree they do look sharp but they are also super easy to keep clean which I appreciate. I also love how I was able to put several cards in there and my favorite pops up higher and is super easy to tap to pay. When I am using one of the other cards it is easy to push down my favorite card and find the one I need. My wallet comfortably holds my driver's license, insurance card and some emergency cash. I usually pay with my card.  I recommend buying this and as it has been months since our purchase please know the lever on the side, buttons and materials have really held up perfectly!  I hope this review helps you and you have a beautiful day.
